154d8e22ccfef3c654dfb202c21ea698.fun_facts: Railroad tycoons like Leland Stanford (founder of Stanford University) lived in Nob Hill at the turn of the 20th Century. The 1906 earthquake completely destroyed Nob Hill, with the exception of the wall that surrounded the mansions of Stanford and his neighbor Mark Hopkins.
locations: Fairmont Hotel (950 Mason Street, Nob Hill)
